Text: Hamster-X i'm glad you shared these, because for the life of me i couldn't locate issue 1

I had them in my collection from ages ago xD But yeah, it's a very cool read, definitely recommended if you're into zombies. Also, James Kuhoric wrote the "Legendary Talespinners" and had a short run in "Army of Darkness".

Thanks man. I just finished the first two, the art adds so much to the tale. Been looking forward to it. 

I appreciate it.
